title: Xpice
synopsis: Kokyo, a city brimming with people from all walks of life, and the prime target of the mysterious group Zerogram. But Red Pepper and Wasabi—a duo from the superhero league XPICE—aren't going to stand idly by.
staff: [['Katou, Hiroaki', ['Producer']], ['Nakai, Tsubasa', ['Director']], ['SCANDAL', ['Inserted Song Performance']], ['Hayashi, Hiromi', ['Art Director']]]
